text: Don Kidd (October 10, 1937 â€“ August 27, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the New Mexico Senate from 1993 to 2005. He was born in Crowell, Texas. Kidd died on August 27, 2020 at his home in Carlsbad, New Mexico from pancreatic cancer at the age of 82.Longtime Republican lawmaker helped pass big-ticket legislation ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Don Kidd
